name: Super Vadimka IV Evil Returns the Horrors of Vadimka's Adventures
name_original: Super Vadimka IV Evil Returns the Horrors of Vadimka's Adventures
description:
In 2022, a series of action-platformer games are clearly being developed. Super Vadimka about the weirdo Vadim Kulev already the fourth part looks like a kind of game there is also an opportunity to choose Vadim Kulev and the evil antihero Sergei Nosikov they reconciled The main character persuaded to be a villain well, later Sergei left the servants of Dr. kulechka now he is taking revenge built a huge piggy hostel burning loop. Winston Kuliyev reappears in the fourth part shooting with a boomerang at Vadim Kulev promotes vile vile weapons opportunities 1 player Vadim Kulev Super Vadimka) 2 player Sergey Novikov The antagonists are mean Dr. Kulechek is an evil builder of monsters and robot cars Winston Kulev is Vadim's older brother, he is an evil boomerang and a rival of Dr. Kulechka.

Super Vadimka IV Evil Returns the Horrors of Vadimka's Adventures - An action-adventure video game in the platformer genre developed by VadimBallzGame head of Gaming Play was released on June 25, 2022 for Windows only and the fourth part of the best game in the world continued. Super Vadimka III Enter ALJ features the fourth part was created just 1 month ago is a very difficult game you will also have to play for Sergei Nosikov, he was the main antagonist of 1-3 parts for the choice, you will also be able to Vadim Kuleva behind him and see the new mechanics of the attacking enemies.
